mission.title: Our Mission & Vision
mission.description: We believe entrepreneurial action can solve the world's toughest challenges. Through Enactus, students use innovation and business principles to improve the world.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We foster creative thinking and innovative solutions to address social challenges through entrepreneurial action.

values.title: Collaboration
values.description: We bring together diverse talents and perspectives to create powerful teams that drive meaningful change.

values.title: Global Impact
values.description: We create sustainable solutions that address local challenges while contributing to global development goals.

values.title: Sustainable Growth
values.description: We develop projects that create lasting economic, social, and environmental value for communities.

impact.title: Entrepreneurial Action for a Better World
impact.description: At Enactus Alexandria University, we believe in the power of business to transform lives. Our student teams develop and implement entrepreneurial projects that empower people to improve their livelihoods in an economically, socially, and environmentally sustainable way.
impact.quote: A head for business. A heart for the world.

project.title: 2025 Project
project.description: Our flagship initiative for sustainable community development and economic empowerment.
project.fullDescription: The 2025 Project is our comprehensive initiative aimed at creating sustainable economic opportunities while addressing environmental challenges in local communities. Through innovative business solutions, we're working to empower underserved populations and create lasting positive change.
project.goal: To create sustainable economic opportunities for 500+ families by 2025
project.impact: Currently benefiting 120 families with increased income and improved living conditions
objectives: Create market access for locally produced goods
Establish a self-sustaining community development fund
project.sustainability: Our approach focuses on building self-sustaining business models that continue to generate value long after our direct involvement ends. We emphasize knowledge transfer, local ownership, and market-based solutions.
project.getInvolved: There are many ways to support the 2025 Project, from mentoring and skills-based volunteering to financial contributions and partnership opportunities.

testimonials.title: Voices of Impact
testimonials.description: Hear from our members about their experiences and the impact Enactus has had on their lives and careers.

items.quote: Being part of Enactus Alexandria has been transformative. I've developed leadership skills while making a real difference in my community.
items.name: Ahmed Hassan

items.quote: Enactus gave me the opportunity to apply classroom knowledge to real-world problems. The experience has been invaluable for my career.
items.name: Nour Ibrahim

items.quote: The mentorship and support I received through Enactus helped me grow both personally and professionally. It's more than just a student organization.
items.name: Layla Mahmoud

cta.title: Join Our Community of Changemakers
cta.description: Become part of a global network of student, academic and business leaders who are transforming lives and shaping a better, more sustainable world.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: We collaborate with leading organizations and businesses to create meaningful impact and drive change.

cta.title: Become a Partner
cta.description: Join us in our mission to create a better world through entrepreneurial action. Partner with Enactus Alexandria University to support student innovation and community impact.

hero.title: Our Story
hero.description: Enactus Alexandria University was founded with a vision to empower students to use entrepreneurial action to improve the quality of life for people in need. Since our establishment, we've been committed to creating sustainable solutions for our community.

timeline.title: Foundation
timeline.description: Enactus Alexandria University was established by a group of passionate students with a vision to create positive change through entrepreneurial action.

timeline.title: First National Competition
timeline.description: Our team participated in the Enactus Egypt National Competition for the first time, presenting our initial projects and gaining valuable experience.

timeline.title: First Major Project
timeline.description: Launched our first major sustainable project, which focused on empowering local artisans through business training and market access.

timeline.title: National Recognition
timeline.description: Received national recognition for our innovative approach to solving community challenges through entrepreneurship.

timeline.title: International Representation
timeline.description: Represented Egypt at the Enactus World Cup, showcasing our projects on a global stage and connecting with teams from around the world.

timeline.title: Expansion & Growth
timeline.description: Expanded our team to over 100 active members and launched multiple high-impact projects addressing various social and environmental challenges.

timeline.title: Continuing the Journey
timeline.description: Today, we continue to innovate and create sustainable solutions for our community, empowering both our members and beneficiaries.

values.title: Integrity
values.description: We act with honesty, transparency, and ethical behavior in all our endeavors.

values.title: Passion
values.description: We approach challenges with enthusiasm and dedication, driven by our commitment to create positive change.

values.title: Collaboration
values.description: We believe in the power of teamwork and partnership to achieve greater impact.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We continuously seek creative and sustainable solutions to address social challenges.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.description: Through our projects and initiatives, we've made a significant impact on our community and beyond.

cta.title: Join Our Mission
cta.description: We're always looking for passionate individuals to join our team and contribute to our mission of creating a better world through entrepreneurial action.

hero.title: Our Team
hero.description: Meet the passionate individuals behind Enactus Alexandria University. Our diverse team of students, faculty advisors, and business leaders work together to create positive change through entrepreneurial action.

leadership.name: Ahmed Ibrahim
leadership.bio: Ahmed leads our team with a passion for social entrepreneurship and sustainable development.

leadership.name: Nour El-Din
leadership.bio: Nour brings extensive experience in project management and community development.

leadership.name: Dr. Laila Hassan
leadership.bio: Dr. Laila provides guidance and mentorship to our team, with expertise in business and economics.
